name: Vorgath the Shadow Weaver
description: A sinister, intelligent, and manipulative entity shrouded in darkness.

goals.secondary: Spread the Influence of the Shadow Realm
goals.ultimate: Merge the Mortal World with the Shadow Realm

backstory.origin: Born from the remnants of an ancient, malevolent god, Vorgath emerged in the Shadow Realm, a parallel dimension filled with darkness and despair. Once a loyal servant to the god, spennth centuries mastering the arts of dark magic and shadow.
key_events: Led the Shadow Invasion against the Dawnlight Empire, causing their downfall.
Captured the Heart of the Four Seasons and darkened them, bringing an eternal twilight to the world.
Attempted to corrupt the World Tree, an act which was thwarted by the Lightbringers, banishing Vorgath temporarily.

allies.name: Nalindra, the Shadow Sorceress
allies.description: A powerful sorceress skilled in dark and shadow magic, fiercely loyal to Vorgath.

allies.name: Kargoth, the Night Beast
allies.description: A terrifying beast from the Shadow Realm, serving as Vorgath

enemies.name: Aeloria, the Dawnbringer
enemies.reason: A celestial being of light who thwarted Vorgath on many occasions.
enemies.description: Aeloria is a powerful entity of light, born from the essence of the sun and sworn to protect the realms from shadow.

enemies.name: Order of the Lightbringers
enemies.reason: A militant order dedicated to opposing dark forces like Vorgath.
enemies.description: This order of knights, mages, and scholars has long been a thorn in Vorgath

texts.title: Songs of the Light
texts.description: A collection of songs and poems chronicling the battles between Light and Shadow, often highlighting Vorgath

artifacts.name: The Shadow Orb
artifacts.description: A powerful artifact capable of controlling shadows and darkness, vital to Vorgath

artifacts.name: The Heart of the Four Seasons
artifacts.description: A crystalline heart holding the essence of the four seasons, corrupted by Vorgath to bring eternal twilight.
